name: DOT Rush
description:
Play with D.O.T and K.I.T to investigate the Hexlive's Lab, in search of a strange power source.

Controls:

WASD - Move:

L-Mouse - Shoot

R-Mouse - Order

F - Call

Esc - Pause

Credits: Shaders:
